name: Curse of The Nekomancer
description:
Note: The game can be difficult. So please don't be afraid to use the level skip button (ENTER), if you just want to see the ending.

 

Game description Curse of The Nekomancer is a cute but tough, short, tile-based puzzle game about a cat cursed with nekomancy. Traverse a set of diverse levels while dodging your evil skeletal copycats, as you try to find a way out of your curse.

 

Jam interpretation This game was a submission to Mini Jam 111: Colors² where the limitation was: 'You are your own enemy'.  This I have interpreted as your inputs and controls being directly tied to the enemies'.  If you die, it was a direct result of your own inputs.

 

Controls WASD or Arrow keys - Move R - Quick restart a level      ENTER - Skip current level      CTRL + R - Restart game      F11 - Toggle fullscreen      ESC - Close game      M - Toggle music      N - Toggle sound effects Note: The game starts in fullscreen. 

 

Credit A game by Zera. Special thanks to the talented composer King Aurorus for making the game's soundtrack! Please check out their other works as well.
